com.localore.localore.model

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localore.localore.model.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    A question about a geo-object. Lives inside a running-quiz.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question()

      • Question

        public Question(long runningQuizId,
                GeoObject geoObject,
                int index,
                int difficulty,
                AppDatabase db)
        Randomize type and generate content based on difficulty. Loads geo-objects from db for question-content (answer-alternatives etc).
        Parameters:
        runningQuizId -
        geoObject -
        index -
        difficulty - Determines level difficulty (no. answer alternatives..). 0 <= this <= DEFAULT_NO_QUESTIONS_PER_GEO_OBJECT (+NO_EXTRA_QUESTIONS)
        db -
